recipe.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pancakes Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; dark chocolate chip ; (90 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, mix the milk, egg, and peanut butter. Set aside.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking powder. Pour wet mixture into dry, add chocolate, and mix thoroughly.
Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, mix the milk, egg, and peanut butter.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking powder.
Pour wet mixture into dry, add chocolate, and mix thoroughly.
Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
